page_content: The page discusses various administrative updates, including new tax forms and events in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides information on operational side expenses in the context of accounting for agricultural and forestry activities.
The page provides guidelines for filing tax returns for different types of partnerships and communities of heirs, mentioning the use of TaxMe-Online and BE-Login for electronic processing.
The page provides information on how to claim transportation costs for commuting via public transport in tax returns.
The page discusses tax-free public or private support, such as social welfare and scholarships, for individuals who are financially dependent.
